item.title: Top economist Mohamed El-Erian breaks ranks with Wall Street and says Powell should resign to preserve Fed independence
item.description: El-Erian, president of Queens' College at Cambridge University, said he was aware that his view did not align with the Wall Street consensus.

item.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent calls for a review of 'the entire' Federal Reserve
item.description: Bessent suggested for a review that would go beyond the current controversy over building renovations.

item.title: Brexit made businesses abandon the UK. Trump's hefty EU tariffs could bring them back
item.description: President Trump's threatened 30% tariffs on the EU might prompt some businesses to take another look at the U.K.

item.title: ‘30% is untenable’: From Irish whiskey to Italian cheese, Trump's tariff threat rattles EU exporters
item.description: "At that 30% level ... it will be a lose-lose situation," one distillery boss told CNBC.

item.title: Israel's stock market outperforms Middle East counterparts despite multi-front wars
item.description: Israel's markets have been lifted by significant foreign investment and more recently by renewed investor confidence following its 12-day conflict wit...
